Kural_Info.Chapter: அமைச்சு (The Office of Minister of state)
Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: வன்கண் குடிகாத்தல் கற்றறிதல் ஆள்வினையோடு ஐந்துடன் மாண்டது அமைச்சு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The minister is one who in addition to the aforesaid five things excels in the possession of firmness, protection of subjects, clearness by learning, and perseverance.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A minister of state is depicted, not as a frail scholar, but as a powerful, rock-solid figure. They are radiating an aura of unwavering firmness ('வன்கண்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: This minister is performing four additional duties simultaneously. One arm is a shield, protecting the people ('குடிகாத்தல்'). Their head glows with the light of profound learning ('கற்றறிதல்'). Their entire body is in a dynamic, energetic pose, showing perseverance ('ஆள்வினை'). These are in addition to the five previous qualities.
Layered_Composition.Background: A secure, prosperous, and enlightened kingdom that thrives under the care of such a multi-talented and virtuous minister.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: An excellent minister combines the previous five skills with four more: firmness, the ability to protect citizens, deep learning, and tireless perseverance.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The rock-solid stance and aura for firmness, the shield for protection, the glowing head for learning, and the dynamic pose for perseverance. The image aims to show a complete, ideal minister.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Strong, protective, wise, energetic, complete, ideal.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A powerful, heroic light illuminates the minister. Each of the virtues can have a subtle, distinct glow, combining to form a brilliant aura of competence.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A heroic, low-angle full-body shot of the minister, making them appear as a pillar of the state.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with a style reminiscent of superhero concept art, emphasizing power and virtue.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Idealized realism, with fantasy elements to showcase the virtues.

Negative_Prompt: weak minister, scared citizens, text artifacts, lazy posture.
